EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #2.2019 Dealer Update #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - November 16, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | November 2018
Trade-In Credit for CD-830 Touchscreen Control Display Unit
- This sales bulletin provides 2019 pricing and product information for upgrading to the CD-830 FMS Control Display Unit. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-03 CD-830 Control Display Unit for Business Aircraft %28Changes....pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Frequency Change for SITA North America
- This sales bulletin provides an upgrade path for operators to utilize the new frequency. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-04 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-04 AFIS DMU Sita Change.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Promotional Pricing for Laseref IV Upgrades
- This sales bulletin provides special pricing for the installation of the Laseref IV to replace the Laseref II and Laseref III which are expected to be unrepairable in 2020. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-06 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-06 Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
